Charles X. Seward (January 11, 1856 â€“ October 12, 1912) was an American politician. A member of the Republican Party, he served in the South Dakota House of Representatives from 1891 to 1982 and again from 1901 to 1902 and in the South Dakota Senate from 1909 to 1910.
